footer.title: WordWizard ✨
footer.description: A powerful text manipulation tool built with React. Transform, analyze, and enhance your text with ease. Multiple themes, real-time stats, and more.

collapseOne.title: Transform Your Text Instantly
collapseOne.content: WordWizard gives you the power to edit, clean, and enhance text in seconds. From converting case and removing extra spaces to trimming lines and generating perfectly formatted paragraphs — every action happens instantly, right in your browser.

collapseTwo.title: Smart Tools for Every Writer
collapseTwo.content: Go beyond the basics with features like Grammar Check, Smart Capitalization, and Lorem Ipsum generation. Whether you're drafting emails, essays, or creative copy, WordWizard helps polish your text with precision and ease.

collapseThree.title: Modern Design Meets Performance
collapseThree.content: Enjoy a sleek interface built for speed and focus. The new ‘Midnight Blue’ theme adds a calm, distraction-free writing space, while smooth animations and instant updates keep the experience fast and fluid — no reloads, no lag.

collapseFour.title: Fully Browser-Based & Privacy-First
collapseFour.content: Your words never leave your browser. WordWizard runs entirely on your device, ensuring complete privacy and zero data tracking. It’s lightweight, offline-friendly, and works seamlessly on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge, and more.

collapseFive.title: Built for Everyone — and Always Evolving
collapseFive.content: WordWizard is free, open-source, and community-driven. We're constantly adding new features — from advanced text statistics and theme customization to creative formatting options — to make writing simpler, faster, and more enjoyable.
